data.title: Gerhart Hauptmann
data.meta_description: Sold for $0 | German dramatist (1862–1946) who won the 1912 Nobel Prize in Literature. TLS in German, one page, 9 x 11.5, December 6, 1933. Letter of
data.text: German dramatist (1862–1946) who won the 1912 Nobel Prize in Literature. TLS in German, one page, 9 x 11.5, December 6, 1933. Letter of thanks to Mrs. Lewenz-Arnhold in Berlin for congratulations he received. In part (translated): “Many thanks for your kind congratulations from Portofino-Vetta. I am hoping to climb this wonderful peak soon again. Also your wish means wind in the sails for this aim.” In fine condition, with central horizontal and vertical folds, one through a single letter of signature, and a few wrinkles. Accompanied by the original mailing envelope. RRAuction COA.
